item.title: Shares of drone maker Unusual Machines soar after Donald Trump Jr. joins advisory board
item.description: Donald Trump Jr., the son of President-elect Donald Trump, said "the need for drones is obvious" as he joined the advisory board of Unusual Machines.

item.title: Musk, Ramaswamy to discuss DOGE with GOP leaders on Capitol Hill Dec. 5
Financials are the best-performing stocks of 2024. Here's one corner that could do especially well
item.description: Fintech stocks are poised to outpace a financial sector that is expected to benefit from a second Trump administration.
